mil6.2.3:5.2: “Vigatasatisammosā kho, mahārāja, arahanto, natthi arahantānaṃ satisammoso”ti.
mil6.2.3:5.6: “Kuṭikāre, mahārāja, sañcaritte, vikāle kālasaññāya, pavārite appavāritasaññāya, anatiritte atirittasaññāyā”ti.
mil6.2.3:6.2: ‘ye āpattiṃ āpajjanti, te dvīhi kāraṇehi āpajjanti anādariyena vā ajānanena vā’ti.
mil6.2.3:6.3: Api nu kho, bhante, arahato anādariyaṃ hoti, yaṃ arahā āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti?
mil6.2.3:7.1: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, arahā āpattiṃ āpajjati, natthi ca arahato anādariyaṃ, tena hi atthi arahato satisammoso”ti?
mil6.2.3:7.2: “Natthi, mahārāja, arahato satisammoso, āpattiñca arahā āpajjatī”ti.
mil6.2.3:8.1: “Tena hi, bhante, kāraṇena maṃ saññāpehi, kiṃ tattha kāraṇan”ti?
mil6.2.3:8.6: Yaṃ loke atthi samaṇānaṃ ananucchavikaṃ ananulomikaṃ, gihīnaṃ anavajjaṃ.
mil6.2.3:8.7: Tattha bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti ‘yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyan’ti.
mil6.2.3:8.8: Vikālabhojanaṃ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṃ, taṃ jinasāsane vajjaṃ.
mil6.2.3:8.9: Bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṃ, taṃ jinasāsane vajjaṃ.
mil6.2.3:8.10: Udake hassadhammaṃ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṃ, taṃ jinasāsane vajjaṃ.
mil6.2.3:8.11: Iti evarūpāni evarūpāni, mahārāja, jinasāsane vajjāni, idaṃ vuccati paṇṇattivajjaṃ.
mil6.2.3:9.1: Yaṃ kilesaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ, taṃ ajānanto āpajjeyya.
mil6.2.3:9.2: Avisayo, mahārāja, ekaccassa arahato sabbaṃ jānituṃ, na hi tassa balaṃ atthi sabbaṃ jānituṃ.
mil6.2.3:9.3: Anaññātaṃ, mahārāja, arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmampi gottampi, maggopi tassa mahiyā anaññāto;
